title: Coconut Margarita Recipe
description: This delicious coconut margarita uses cream of coconut for a refreshing cocktail that will add a tropical flavor to Cinco de Mayo or any summer party.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Global Cuisines Latin American Mexican Coconut Margarita 4.9 (16) 16 Reviews 4 Photos This creamy coconut margarita is a delicious cross between a margarita and a pina colada! Great for Cinco de Mayo. Submitted by MrsFisher0729 Updated on March 5, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 4 4 Prep Time: 10 mins Total Time: 10 mins Servings: 6 Yield: 6 coconut margaritas Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 1 (15 ounce) can cream of coconut (such as Coco Lopez) 1 cup ice ¾ cup tequila (such as Sauza 100% Blue Agave) ½ cup freshly squeezed lime juice ¼ cup brandy-based orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier) Directions Blend cream of coconut, ice, tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur in a blender until smooth. Cook’s Note You can dip the rim of your glass in lime juice, then roll it in sugar, salt, or crushed, toasted coconut if desired. I Made It Print 21 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 379 Calories 13g Fat 48g Carbs 0g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 379 % Daily Value * Total Fat 13g 16% Saturated Fat 10g 50% Sodium 40mg 2% Total Carbohydrate 48g 18% Dietary Fiber 0g 0% Total Sugars 47g Protein 0g 0% Vitamin C 6mg 7% Calcium 4mg 0% Potassium 26mg 1% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Coconut Margarita 01 of 04 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 04 Photo by  LazyFoodieGirl 05/02/2015 This was a delicious blend of both sweet, creamy coconut and tart, savory margarita flavors! I had it as-is and it was delightful, but also blended some strawberries into the second half of the blender batch and it was even MORE amazing. Why didn't I think of this before? 03 of 04 Photo by  cadel 02/02/2015 Really great recipe definitely a new favorite 1 You’ll Also Love Strawberry Basil Margarita 55 Ratings Magnificent Mango Margaritas 16 Ratings Margaritas Maravillosos 3 Ratings Mama D's Very Berry Margaritas 5 Ratings Classic Frozen Strawberry Margarita 17 Ratings Coconut Margaritas 21 Ratings Frozen Raspberry Margaritas 4 Ratings Kiwi Margarita 28 Ratings Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Margarita 405 Ratings Rhubarb Margarita 37 Ratings Limegasm 2 Ratings Strawberry Beer Margaritas 9 Ratings Banana Margaritas 36 Ratings Whole Lime Margarita 10 Ratings Blue Lagoon Margarita 4 Ratings Peach Margaritas 1 Rating Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: MrsFisher0729
instructions: Blend cream of coconut, ice, tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur in a blender until smooth.
